SQLStoredProcedureSpec.Name: USR_USP_DATALIST_TopFoodItemShortByBPRunCLR
SQLStoredProcedureSpec.Description: Top Food Item Shortages By Business Process Run. Used by 'Top Food Item Shortages By BPRun Data List CLR' spec to pull food bank shortage data from user specifiedBP output table
SQLStoredProcedureSpec.Author: Technical Training
SQLStoredProcedureSpec.CreateProcedureSQL:
create procedure dbo.USR_USP_DATALIST_TopFoodItemShortByBPRunCLR(@BUSINESSPROCESSOUTPUTID UniqueIdentifier = NULL) --WITH EXECUTE AS OWNER as set nocount on;
DECLARE @OUTPUTTABLENAME NVARCHAR(100) DECLARE @SQLQUERY AS NVARCHAR(500)
SELECT @OUTPUTTABLENAME = TABLENAME FROM dbo.BUSINESSPROCESSOUTPUT WHERE dbo.BUSINESSPROCESSOUTPUT.ID = @BUSINESSPROCESSOUTPUTID
SET @SQLQUERY = 'SELECT TOP 5 FOODITEMNAME, SUM(INVENTORYSHORTAGE) as SUMINVENTORYSHORTAGE FROM ' + @OUTPUTTABLENAME + ' GROUP BY FOODITEMNAME ORDER BY SUMINVENTORYSHORTAGE DESC'
EXECUTE (@SQLQuery)
